name: Little Regen
description:
Little Regen is a sandbox demo to customize a piece of land with some amazing off-grid infrastructure housing.

Houses includes:

Pallet racks (inspired by Mars College https://mars.college/)

JUPE https://www.jupe.com/

CabinDAO (not fully offgrid yet but a cool community) https://www.cabin.city/

Tinybox https://www.gotinybox.com/
